title: Santa Cruz Organic Foods
description: Santa Cruz International is Taiwan's largest organic food importer/distributor and was acquired by the owner 7-Eleven convenience stores on Taiwan to establish a chain of organic food stores here. This branch is the size of a convenience store, mainly carrying packaged health and organic foods (local and imported). Juices, nuts, grains, pasta, beans, seaweed, snacks, tofu, sauces, seasonings, and food-based nutritional supplements. A small selection of fresh organic produce is available. Note: although the street sign actually gives road name as "CingNian", the Pinyin spelling "QingNian" is given here to work with Google Maps.
